com.link_intersystems.lang

Class ClassLoaderContextAware

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.link_intersystems.lang.ContextAware<ClassLoader>
      • com.link_intersystems.lang.ClassLoaderContextAware

  • public final class ClassLoaderContextAware
extends ContextAware<ClassLoader>
    A ClassLoaderContextAware encapsulated a thread's context class loader management. It ensures that the ClassLoaderContextAware's class loader is available as the thread's context class loader when a Callables, Runnable or reflection method calls is executed. See ContextAware for more details.
    Since:
    1.2.0;
    Author:
    Ren√© Link [rene.link@link- intersystems.com]
    See Also:
    ContextAware.createContextProxy(Object), ContextAware.runInContext(Callable), ContextAware.runInContext(Runnable), ContextAware.invokeInContext(Object, String, Object...)

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.link_intersystems.lang.ContextAware

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected ClassLoader activateContext()
      Binds the class loader that this ClassLoaderContextAware was created with to the current threads Thread.getContextClassLoader().
      protected void deactivateContext(ClassLoader previousClassLoader)
      Unbinds this ClassLoaderContextAware's class loader from this Thread.getContextClassLoader() and restores the class loader that was previously.
      static ClassLoaderContextAware forClassLoader(ClassLoader classLoader)
      Creates a ClassLoaderContextAware for the given classLoader.

    • Field Detail

    • Method Detail

      • forClassLoader

        public static ClassLoaderContextAware forClassLoader(ClassLoader classLoader)
        Creates a ClassLoaderContextAware for the given classLoader. The system class loader is used if the given classLoader is null . This method uses an internal cache and returns the cached ClassLoaderContextAware if possible. The cache uses WeakReferences so that the ClassLoaderContextAwares will get garbage collected if they are only referenced by this cache.
        Parameters:
        classLoader - the classLoader to use or null if the system class loader should be used.
        Returns:
        Since:
        1.2.0;

      • activateContext

        protected ClassLoader activateContext()
        Binds the class loader that this ClassLoaderContextAware was created with to the current threads Thread.getContextClassLoader().
        Specified by:
        activateContext in class ContextAware<ClassLoader>
        Returns:
        the previous class loader that was bound to the current thread's Thread.getContextClassLoader() when this method was called.
        Since:
        1.2.0;

      • deactivateContext

        protected void deactivateContext(ClassLoader previousClassLoader)
        Unbinds this ClassLoaderContextAware's class loader from this Thread.getContextClassLoader() and restores the class loader that was previously.
        Specified by:
        deactivateContext in class ContextAware<ClassLoader>
        Parameters:
        previousClassLoader - the object that was returned by the ContextAware.activateContext() call.
        Since:
        1.2.0;
